DOC.brief_summary: This single arm study evaluate safety profile Xeloda monotherapy adjuvant treatment colon cancer . All patient receive Xeloda 1250mg/m2 p.o . twice daily intermittent treatment ( 3 week cycle consist 2 week treatment follow 1 week without treatment ) . The anticipated time study treatment 3-12 month , target sample size 500+ individual .
